title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.4 - Emergency occurrences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.4 - Emergency occurrences

State Regulations

The person in charge of a retail food store that is
affected by a fire, flood, extended power outage or a similar significant
occurrence that creates a reasonable probability that food in the retail food
store may have been contaminated or that the temperature level of food which is
in a potentially hazardous form may have caused that food to become hazardous
to health, shall take such action as is necessary to protect the public health
and shall promptly notify the Department of Agriculture and Markets of the
emergency. Notes
